channel.title: The Sunset Limited
channel.description:
This is a TV movie based on a play, and in my opinion was the best film of 2011. Probably the best movie I've seen in quite a few years, and that's saying something considering the cast comprises of just 2 men, Samuel L Jackson and Tommy Lee Jones.
Simple enough story line and setting; "Two men in an apartment with their opposing beliefs".
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1510938/
If you like 12 Angry Men, The Man from Earth, and other similar films which rely on good dialogue in a single setting then this is a must see.

item.title: The Sunset Limited
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

I know this post is a few days old, but after seeing this, I decided to go ahead and watch it.
And I agree with it being a great film, the dialogue is amazing and for being a two man film, it actually kept my attention throughout. This whole thing really hit me hard considering these are the same things I have grown up around going to Catholic school for 12 years and hearing the multiple beliefs about everything. And although I’ve now seen the film, I am tempted to go out and read the play itself just so I can see everything that Cormac McCarthy wrote and read his dialogue for myself.

Read full topic

The Sunset Limited (TV Movie 2011)

Directed by Tommy Lee Jones. With Samuel L. Jackson, Tommy Lee Jones. Two men in an apartment with their opposing beliefs.

If you like 12 Angry Men, The Man from Earth, and other similar films which rely on good dialogue in a single setting then this is a must see.
